## slu login

Login to slu vault

```
slu login [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help              help for login
  -p, --password string   Vault password
  -U, --url string        Vault URL (default "https://vault-slu.sikalabs.io")
  -u, --user string       Vault username (default "ondrejsika")
```
